abstract: The capacitance of a capacitor-within-capacitor structure is assessed through simulations. The overall capacitance of the structure may substantially increase and the overall capacitance may be electrically controlled.
title: Capacitor-within-Capacitor: Electrically Controlled Capacitors
abstract_utf8: The capacitance of a capacitor-within-capacitor structure is assessed through simulations. The overall capacitance of the structure may substantially increase and the overall capacitance may be electrically controlled.
